price: (149) Say, "With Allāh is the far-reaching [i.e., conclusive] argument. If He had willed, He would have guided you all."
arabic: قُلۡ فَلِلَّهِ ٱلۡحُجَّةُ ٱلۡبَٰلِغَةُۖ فَلَوۡ شَآءَ لَهَدَىٰكُمۡ أَجۡمَعِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: qul falillahi al-ḥujatu al-bālighatu falaw shāa lahadākum ajmaʿīna
